## PopulatableEthersStabilio.stakeXbrlWethUniTokens() method

Stake Uniswap XBRL/ETH LP tokens to participate in liquidity mining and earn STBL.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stakeXbrlWethUniTokens(amount: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<PopulatedEthersStabilioTransaction<void>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of LP tokens to add to new or existing stake. |
